thread.section_title: Ace Ticket Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Ticket | www.aceticket.com | 4 of 197
thread.title: ROLAND

author: ROLAND
title: ROLAND
text: When I contacted Ace, you made it seem like these were the only tickets left. And maybe they were the only ones you had. But the cost to me was $178, and the face value was $14, and when we arrived at the rink it was 70% empty. So I feel cheated, and will not deal with Ace again for my tickets. The game itself was great, that's why two stars and not one. I feel ripped off.
